This app not working. All I get is a calender that does nothing.
replyContent: EDIT: Hi, this is just a KEY (license) which unlocks premium features from the main widget (and today app is completely for FREE) - so just install this KEY and then install main application here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=sk.mildev84.agendareminder Regards, MS

content: Good. Worth it to purchase.
Bought new phone app is asking me to repurchase. Update: I was going to go ahead and repurchase but it won't let me and it won't remove the ad to purchase from the top.
replyContent: EDIT: Hi, I apologize for late reply (I didnt get the notification). No need to buy again, license is lifetime (email me to get a refund, if you already did). All purchases are tied with your google account (from which you bought app). So just add same google account on any device, and you'll be able to install KEY again without paying. Cheers, MS

content: Great app
Can I uninstall this app once I have the other one installed?

I switched to this app because my previous agenda widget didn't work properly with Android 10. I'm glad I did as this app is much more attractive and usable. Bonus for not requiring a subscription to get pro features!

For the internet permission and trackers (Google Firebase Analytics) in the main app. Trackers within a paid app are unacceptable. Not recommended to purchase since it started to track its users. Used to be one of the best calendar widget apps. Not any longer.
replyContent: Hi, I can assure you there are no "trackers" - nothing is tracked. I only use firebase because I want to be able to make "on the fly" discounts - not sure why it is such a big problem, most apps (and all calendar widgets) have firebase for years and use it MUCH MUCH MORE than my app. I can answer any questions you might have by email ;) Cheers, MS

content: Love it

Nice that it just gives you a view of the month with day numbers, and Tiny dots to indicate that there is some event, but that's not a help to me because to see the event or the time you have to open your Samsung calendar app. So there is just no advantage to having the widget if I have to open the Calendar app anyway. I need a widget that actually shows small text and times so that I can see them on my homepage without having to click and open the Calendar app.
replyContent: Hi, there are 2 views in my widget - agenda and calendar. You can use agenda view to see all details of all events right on your homescreen, without need of opening calendar application :) Cheers, MS

content: Necessary application for me. And the best I could find, for that purpose.

I didn't know I needed/wanted a widget/app like this until I saw it featured on a YouTube video. As per usual, I checked out several different ones, but this is the one I chose to keep and pay for. I very much appreciate the minimal nudges to pay for this and I could easily have kept using the free version indefinitely. I don't mind paying for something well done and this is going to be a core part of my phone's UI here on out. I chose this one mostly because it seemed the most intuitive both in use and in the settings. The separate agenda widget makes customizing the layout easy. In my case I'll have a small version under the calendar and a full sized one on the page next to that. I have an active wallpaper so the minimalist default is what I'll be sticking with though I may make highlights on days a bit brighter to be more easily seen. As far as the price, this is actually one of the most expensive apps I've bought, but given the amount of use it will be getting, I feel it was more than fair.
Good
great app
Ok
App literally did nothing. I paid $2 but the banner is still there. After a few minutes and clicking a few buttons, returned to page and clicked refund.
replyContent: Hi Horton, I am sorry for that, but most probably widget was just killed/frozen by energy saving so after buying it didnt refresh (so banner didnt disappear). In such cases restart of device helps. Also, do you think I would sell something which "does nothing" and had 3 millions downloads and 4.5 rating? I am not that good magician :)) Cheers, MS

content: Out our many calendar widget apps I've tried, I felt this one was worth paying for because it gives you enough customization flexibility but at the same time doesn't make it too overwhelming. I had a question and emailed support and heard back within a few minutes. Highly recommend!

Works great, happy to pay for the full version. It has good 
formatting/customisation options, but an unfortunate choice the designer 
has made is to have the colour labels for each items in muted colours, so 
that each colour is a pale version of the "real" colour. This makes the 
colours harder to tell apart, especially as the colours are only shown by a 
thin line. There should be more choices over how to use the colours, such 
as being able to use the label colour as the background of each entry, or 
to be able to increase the thickness of the coloured line. Thanks

My original tablet that had your pro version died. Do I need to purchase 
the pro version again for my new tablet?
replyContent: Hi, I really apologize for late reply, but somehow I did not get a notification and only found your review when manually checking older reviews. To the point -  no, you only buy once and use everywhere. This and more is described in FAQ. Cheers, MS

content: I love Google.... period.

Was doubful for quite some time but finally purchased it. Only thing is the skins available are no good. I wish u wud add the option wer users cud set pictures as the background. that wud seriously make this money spent well worth it. 2- why does the 12 hour format keep changing everytime I add the widget again?  it passes me off.
Has nice options.  Works well enough.  Only crashes on me once every couple weeks or so.  I bought the key and install it on all ROM flashes.
replyContent: Hi eddie, when app crashes please send me crash report and write me your mail and some comment inside like when and how it happens, and maybe I will be able to fix it. Cheers, MS

content: I have this app since appgratis turn it to free ( not this pro key). I had some problems due to the fact of me tested some  roms and lost the pro version. Because I love this widget I supported the developer getting this pro version... WORTH EVERY PENNY, Belive me
Clear and easy to use. Although lite version is a little bit disappointing as it only has one calendar feed. Suitable only really as a demo. Developer provided good prompt help.
Brilliant
Thanks for the answer!
replyContent: Hi, sure, just go to settings - 1st Tab, and on Event details uncheck alarm button (or whatever you want). Cheers, MS

content: This works without problems. Excellent.
It is a really good widget don't get me wrong the look and the feel the app is smooth but in all I feel there can be more skins for it and also the option to change the colors of the skins too.

I have been a paid user for a long time.   This app is so good that I would gladly pay or subscribe again. Some apps have a "Donate" button.  If you add a donate button, I will be delighted to contribute.  After all, this widget/app helps me again and again.  I wish to express my thanks using $$$.
replyContent: Hi Loco, thank you very much for such compliment, I appreciate it a lot !!! I am glad, that my hard work helps somebody. So once again thanks. For now there is no "donation app" on market, but you can write me mail with more details on milandroid84@gmail.com :) Have a nice day. Cheers, MS

content: I love this app! I can customize it just how I want it!! Can you add contact birthday to the list?
Good.
‚ô°it
This is my favorite agenda widget app. Great customer service!

I don't like how buying the pro version clutters my app drawer with an icon that doesn't do anything. Please come up with a better way to authenticate the pro version or just make it a separate app. I mean really?
replyContent: Hi, it was fixed in latest version, just update app :) Cheers, MS

content: An awesome and easy-to-use widget with a great layout. Well worth the money. I highly recommend this app.  I have just one question (it is just a matter of personal interest for me): Is it possible to hide the shortcut of the Key app in the App drawer or to merge it with the regular App?  I have installed a lot of paid apps and most of the apps allow me to hide the shortcut of the Key. This keeps the app drawer clear from unused shortcuts. Thank you.
replyContent: Hi, thanks for compliment :) To your problem - well this is not so easy. but I am working on solution, I just must be sure it will work on all phones...Cheers, MS

content: Just missing one thing - I bought PRO version to be able to manage more than one calendar. But all dates on the widget are the same colour. I would like to display the agenda info in the colour of their corresponding calendar. Will raise to 5 stars if implemented.
replyContent: Hi, this is of course implemented - see application screenshots on google play page :)) Send me please 2 screenshots - 1. from widget settings (1st tab with calendars) and 2. from widget on screen. Maybe it's some misunderstanding...Cheers, MS

content: I have purchased your product. I hope it will give me what I am looking for. If not I will give a shout through here üòú

Does exactly what it says it will do.. info is quickly available and displayed nicely.  The option to add an alarm is great. I purchased the pro as I have more than one calender and didn't mind rewarding the obvious thought that went into this app... great job!
Really nice and useful widget.   U also got fast support and help with answers.
When you hide the toolbar, the bottom left options button, I can't see it. It's like transparent or something. Is there a mini refresh button?  Overall, amazing app!
replyContent: EDIT: no, it's not transparent, only semi-transparent. You can definitely see it without problems with default widget settings (especially 30% transparency) - problem is, that it's much worse visible, when you set higher transparency like 80-100% to widget...I must do something with it in next version ;)

content: Unlocks a great app, so yeah, awesome
Alle Funktionen die ich ben√∂tige!  Sehr netter Entwickler, der alle meine Fragen kompetent beantworten konnte.

I really like the app so far. I dont think it is too expensive. Seems pretty cheap compared to some others. I would easily pay up to $5 for this. One question is there a lock screen feature? Edit: thanks for the reply by dev. I understand now about the lock screen. I am happy to wait
replyContent: Hi, thanks for opinion & compliment :) Lock screen widget is feature of android 4.2 and higher, and my app supports also lower android versions (4.0/4.1). So I have to create new version specially for 4.2 users. You can be sure, it will be implemented - once the ratio of android 4.2 users increases to reasonable level - now it's approx. 7% users :)

content: Well worth the $1.99!!! Keep up the great work.
Very responsive developer and well designed widget.
replyContent: Hi, thanks for compliment :)

content: It deserves 5 stars easily, this is how an Agenda widget should look like. Easy to use, customizable and above all a responsive developer.

Best looking and best function. My only gripe is that when you hide the settings bar, a gear icon floats over one of the agenda items. Move it or provide option to make it transparent. UPDATE: The dev responded quickly and moved the icon over! This app is exactly what you need. Pure Gold!

App does nearly everything I want in an agenda widget.  Not too many settings - enough to be useful.  Developer is very responsive to requests and suggestions - if you EMAIL him. This app keeps getting better and better. Thanks for a great widget.
Great ap and great support- this is a must have ap for anyone using calendar on phone and tablet. Works great on nexus 7 and Samsung s2.
If the price was more like $1, I would buy it in a heartbeat. I love the widget, but again, it's still a little too expensive for a widget. It deserves 5 stars if the price was a little lower
replyContent: Hi, thanks for compliment, I'll keep working hard. To your suggestion - unlike all others calendar widgets mine has also custom calendar reminder option...And I didn't mention many customization options ;) These are one of the reasons, why my app has maybe a little higher price - but still pretty usual and reasonable price I think ;)

content: The calendar shows the birthdays a day off. All birthdays for today are listed as yesterday. Love that I can post directly to their wall though.
replyContent: Hi, it was fixed few months ago, now everything should be ok :)

content: Developer of this app is open to suggestions and fast in implementing them.
Sorry....not as good as l thought it'd be :-(
replyContent: Hi, thanks for opionion. However, can you please specify more details for me & other users? I refunded you money without any problems, so I think it would be fair at least make comment more constructive (so I can improve my app). Thanks

content: Very usefull, am actually using 2 google calendars, facebook calendar and company exchange calendar in the widget. Great developer, i had a issue with facebook calendar, wrote him and he fixed it next day. Worth the money.
